resources.string:
汉语水平考试（HSK）是一项国际标准化考试，重点考查汉语非第一语言的考生在生活、学习和工作中运用汉语进行交际的能力。
 考试等级包括HSK（一级）、HSK（二级）、HSK（三级）、HSK（四级）、HSK（五级）和HSK（六级）。
 Chinese Proficiency Test (HSK), an international standardized test of Chinese language proficiency,assesses non-native Chinese speakers’ abilities in using the Chinese language in their daily, academic and professional lives.
 HSK consists of six levels, namely HSK (level I), HSK (level II), HSK (level III), HSK (level IV), HSK(level V), and HSK (level VI).
